name: Pirates At Heart
description:
SYNOPSIS: Riki is a pirate captain who finds herself washed up on the shore of a mysterious island. To make matters worse, she's lost her memories and the island is crawling with monsters! As Riki explores the island she'll find friends that can help her survive and slowly she regains her memories.

This game is short, but it was made with love. It features fun monsters and original music!

BONUS: This game also comes with a cheat folder which contains images of events that take place during the game. If you don't want the story spoiled for you, please avoid the folder until after you beat the game!
